T03D3819:280b-1: a'arya pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a hri da ya by'a khy'a /
T03D3819:281a-1: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i rnam par bshad pa /
T03D3819:281a-2: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3819:281a-3: de la bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha
T03D3819:281a-4: rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'o zhes bya ba ni
T03D3819:281a-5: mdo'i mtshan nyid brjod pas na bcom ldan 'das ma
T03D3819:281a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po
T03D3819:281a-7: zhes bya'o // thog ma kho nar ming ma btags
T03D3819:281a-8: na mdo gang yin gtol med pa'i phyir ming smos
T03D3819:281a-9: zhes bya'o // so // ming btags pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
T03D3819:281a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po
T03D3819:281a-11: 'di'i mdo thams cad kyang 'dir ma 'dus pa med
T03D3819:281a-12: pas mdo'i yang mdo zhes bya'o //
T03D3819:281a-13: de la bcom zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi bcom pa ste /
T03D3819:281a-14: phung po'i bdud la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha
T03D3819:281a-15: rol tu phyin pa'i don 'dis bdud btsal du mi
T03D3819:281a-16: rnyed cing bdud thams cad mi gnas pa'i phyir bcom
T03D3819:281a-17: pa'o // ldan zhes bya ba ni legs pa drug dang ldan pa ste /
T03D3819:281a-18: mkhyen pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang shes rab kyi
T03D3819:281a-19: pha rol tu phyin pa'i byin gyi rlabs las byung
T03D3819:281a-21: 'das zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T03D3819:281a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gyi
T03D3819:281a-23: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa thams cad
T03D3819:281a-24: bzlog ste / bag chags thams cad dang bral bas na 'das zhes bya'o //
T03D3819:281a-25: ma zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
T03D3819:281a-26: thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3819:281a-27: pa'i don spyad pa las byung /
T03D3819:281a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gyis
T03D3819:281a-29: bskyed pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3819:281a-30: pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum du gyur
T03D3819:281a-32: shes rab ces bya ba ni thos pa dang /
T03D3819:281a-34: bsgoms pa'i shes rab rnam pa gsum gyis yang dag
T03D3819:281a-35: pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas na shes
T03D3819:281a-36: rab ces bya'o // pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
T03D3819:281a-37: bya ba ni shes rab kyis chos gang yang rjes
T03D3819:281a-38: su ma mthong ba'i phyir mtshan ma dang mtha' gnyis
T03D3819:281a-39: dang skye shi las 'das pa'i phyir pha rol tu
T03D3819:281a-41: snying po zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha
T03D3819:281a-42: rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs
T03D3819:281a-43: pa'i nang nas zab mo mchog thams cad mdo nyung
T03D3819:281a-44: ngu 'di'i nang du ma 'dus pa med pas na
T03D3819:281b-0: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha @281b rol
T03D3819:281b-1: tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa ni
T03D3819:281b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa'i
T03D3819:281b-3: mdo las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3819:281b-5: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal
T03D3819:281b-6: ba dang 'dra'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi
T03D3819:281b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
T03D3819:281b-11: mgo mjug tu don rnam pa bdun gyis gsal bar
T03D3819:281b-12: bshad de / de yang gang zhe na /
T03D3819:281b-15: stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T03D3819:281b-16: shes rab kyi spyod yul dang /
T03D3819:281b-17: shes rab kyi yon tan dang /
T03D3819:281b-20: de la gleng gzhi ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3819:281b-21: thabs cig tu bzhugs te zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3819:281b-22: shes rab la 'jug pa ni phung po lnga yang
T03D3819:281b-23: rang bzhin gyis stong par blta'o zhes bya ba'i bar
T03D3819:281b-24: du'o // stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni thob pa yang ma yin /
T03D3819:281b-25: ma thob pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3819:281b-26: shes rab kyi spyod yul ni thob pa med par
T03D3819:281b-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
T03D3819:281b-28: shing spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3819:281b-29: shes rab kyi yon tan ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3819:281b-30: shes rab kyi 'bras bu ni byang chub tu mngon
T03D3819:281b-31: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba'i bar
T03D3819:281b-32: du'o // shes rab kyi gzungs ni mjug gi sngags yan chad do //
T03D3819:281b-33: da ni gleng gzhi'i don bshad de /
T03D3819:281b-34: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni
T03D3819:281b-35: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thams cad 'phags pa
T03D3819:281b-37: bsdus pas na bdag gis thos pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3819:281b-38: de la 'di skad ces bya ba ni shes rab
T03D3819:281b-39: kyi snying po'i rnam grangs ji snyed brjod pa nyid
T03D3819:281b-40: do // bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni
T03D3819:281b-41: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung nas mnyan te
T03D3819:281b-42: do // / dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa mngon sum du rna ba'i dbang pos thos pa'o //
T03D3819:281b-43: dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi
T03D3819:281b-44: snying po dus gzhan na bshad pa la mi bya'o
T03D3819:281b-45: // bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab na 'khor
T03D3819:281b-46: 'di rnams la lan cig kho na zhig bshad pa'i
T03D3819:282a-1: ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni de la ston pa ni su zhig yin /
T03D3819:282a-4: 'dus nas don ci zhig mdzad de /
T03D3819:282a-5: ston pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
T03D3819:282a-6: yul ni rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod phung po'i ri la /
T03D3819:282a-7: 'khor ni dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang ;
T03D3819:282a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so //
T03D3819:282a-9: 'dus nas don ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T03D3819:282a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di ston to //
T03D3819:282a-11: de la tshig gnyer bshad pa ni gong ma dang 'dra /
T03D3819:282a-12: rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
T03D3819:282a-13: zhes bya ba ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i
T03D3819:282a-15: yul ljongs kyi grong khyer spyi'i ming du btags pa'o //
T03D3819:282a-16: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri zhes bya ba ni
T03D3819:282a-17: yul ljongs de rgya che bas bya rgod phung po'i
T03D3819:282a-18: ri ste mtho la bya mang po 'du ba'i phyir
T03D3819:282a-20: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba ni mthu che ba dang grangs mang ba'o //
T03D3819:282a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po zhes pa
T03D3819:282a-22: ni thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:282a-23: phyin pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa mngon sum du
T03D3819:282a-24: chud cing gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:282a-25: phyin pa la 'jog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang
T03D3819:282a-26: po'o // thabs cig tu bzhugs te zhes bya ba
T03D3819:282a-27: ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang pos bskor te bzhugs
T03D3819:282a-28: po'o // pa'o // 'di yan chad ni gleng gzhi'o //
T03D3819:282a-29: da ni shes rab la 'jug pa'i don gyis bshad de /
T03D3819:282a-30: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs zab
T03D3819:282a-31: mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
T03D3819:282a-32: snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3819:282a-33: de la bcom ldan 'das 'khor de dag dang /
T03D3819:282a-34: sems can thams cad la thugs brtse zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T03D3819:282a-35: de la chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo snang ba
T03D3819:282a-36: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi gzhung 'dis chos thams
T03D3819:282a-37: cad dmigs pa dang mtha' thams cad las 'das par
T03D3819:282a-38: ston cing mkhyen pa'i phyir zab mo snang ba zhes
T03D3819:282a-39: bya'o // ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs zhes
T03D3819:282a-40: bya ba ni zab mo de nyid la mnyam par
T03D3819:282a-41: bya'o // gzhag pa'o // yang de'i tshe byang chub
T03D3819:282a-42: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
T03D3819:282a-43: gzigs kyi dbang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:282b-0: phyin pa zab mo spyod pa @282b 'di nyid la
T03D3819:282b-2: phung po lnga po de nyid la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par blta'o zhes pa la /
T03D3819:282b-3: yang de'i tshe zhes pa ni 'khor 'dus pa dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus na'o //
T03D3819:282b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po rang bzhin
T03D3819:282b-5: gyis stong par blta'o zhes pa'i bar du ni 'phags
T03D3819:282b-6: pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'khor de rnams
T03D3819:282b-7: dang / sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i
T03D3819:282b-8: phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
T03D3819:282b-9: mo nyid la rnam par rtog cing phung po de
T03D3819:282b-10: dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid
T03D3819:282b-11: las gzhan du gyur pa gang yang med do zhes
T03D3819:282b-13: phung po lnga zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po ni dbu ba'i gong bu lta bu'o //
T03D3819:282b-14: tshor ba ni chu bur lta bu'o //
T03D3819:282b-15: 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o //
T03D3819:282b-16: 'du byed ni chu shing lta bu'o //
T03D3819:282b-17: rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T03D3819:282b-18: rang bzhin gyis stong pa zhes pa ni phung po
T03D3819:282b-19: lnga po de dag rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyis
T03D3819:282b-21: mtha' thams cad las 'das shing mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid do //
T03D3819:282b-22: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus sangs
T03D3819:282b-23: rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3819:282b-24: po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la
T03D3819:282b-25: 'di skad ces smras so zhes pa ni nyan thos
T03D3819:282b-26: chen po'i nang na shes rab kyi mchog tu gyur
T03D3819:282b-27: pa'i sh'a ri'i bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
T03D3819:282b-28: rlabs kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po
T03D3819:282b-29: la dris so // rigs kyi bu gang la la
T03D3819:282b-30: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
T03D3819:282b-31: spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab
T03D3819:282b-32: par bya zhes bya ba la ;
T03D3819:282b-33: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i gsung rab las skyes te /
T03D3819:282b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su gyur pa'o //
T03D3819:282b-35: gang la la zhes pa ni theg pa chen po la zhugs pa gang su yang rung ba'o //
T03D3819:282b-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
T03D3819:282b-37: pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3819:282b-38: tu phyin pa spyod pas chos thams cad kyi de
T03D3819:282b-39: bzhin nyid zab mo brjod du med par spyod pa'o
T03D3819:282b-40: // spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par
T03D3819:282b-41: bya zhes pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:282b-42: phyin pa'i don spyad par 'dod pa des ji lta
T03D3819:282b-43: bu zhig tu shes par bya zhing bslab par bya
T03D3819:282b-44: // zhes dris pa'o / de skad ces smras pa dang /
T03D3819:283a-1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
T03D3819:283a-2: ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshe dang ldan pa sh'a
T03D3819:283a-3: ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so zhes pa
T03D3819:283a-4: ni dris pa'i lan smras pa'o //
T03D3819:283a-5: sh'a ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
T03D3819:283a-6: mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:283a-7: phyin pa zab mo spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa
T03D3819:283a-8: nges 'di ltar brtag par bya ste zhes pa ni
T03D3819:283a-9: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3819:283a-10: spyad par 'dod pa des 'og tu bshad pa'i don
T03D3819:283a-11: bzhin du brtag par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T03D3819:283a-12: phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis
T03D3819:283a-13: stong par yang dag par rjes su blta'o zhes pa
T03D3819:283a-14: ni phung po lnga po de dag ni rang bzhin
T03D3819:283a-16: mtshan nyid med pas sngon gyi dus nas ma skyes /
T03D3819:283a-17: da ltar gyi dus na mi gnas /
T03D3819:283a-18: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi 'gag ste /
T03D3819:283a-19: dus thams cad du skye ba dang /
T03D3819:283a-21: 'gag par ma gyur pas mi gnas pa'i rang bzhin brjod du med pas na stong nyid do //
T03D3819:283a-22: blta'o zhes pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du blta'i /
T03D3819:283a-23: de las gzhan pa gang du yang mi blta'o zhes pa'o //
T03D3819:283a-24: 'di yan chad ni shes rab la 'jug pa'o //
T03D3819:283a-25: da ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi don gyis bshad de /
T03D3819:283a-27: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so zhes pa la /
T03D3819:283a-28: de la gzugs so zhes pa ni stong pa nyid
T03D3819:283a-29: kyi rang bzhin khong du ma chud pas 'khrul pa'i
T03D3819:283a-30: sems kyis gzugs su mthong zhing rtog pa'am /
T03D3819:283a-31: tshig gis tha snyad du 'dogs pa'o //
T03D3819:283a-32: stong pa'o zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin
T03D3819:283a-33: stong pa nyid yin pas snga ma 'das pa'i dus
T03D3819:283a-34: na yang mtshan nyid med pas dmigs su med /
T03D3819:283a-35: da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang mtshan nyid med de /
T03D3819:283a-36: dmigs su med pas mtha' thams cad dang dngos po
T03D3819:283a-37: thams cad mi gnas pa'i phyir stong pa nyid ces
T03D3819:283a-38: bya'o // stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so zhes bya
T03D3819:283a-39: ba ni stong pa nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'i
T03D3819:283a-40: rang bzhin la gzugs so zhes tshig gi tha snyad
T03D3819:283a-41: bya'o // du btags la / de gud na mi gnas pa'i phyir stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
T03D3819:283a-42: gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin /
T03D3819:283a-43: stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no
T03D3819:283a-44: zhes pa ni gzugs gang yin pa de nyid brjod
T03D3819:283b-0: du med pa'i stong pa nyid yin @283b gyi ;
T03D3819:283b-1: gzugs spangs te stong pa nyid btsal du mi rnyed
T03D3819:283b-2: pas na gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin
T03D3819:283b-3: zhes bya'o // brjod du med pa'i stong pa nyid
T03D3819:283b-4: gang yin pa de nyid la gzugs so zhes tshig
T03D3819:283b-5: gi tha snyad du btags pa gud na mi 'dug
T03D3819:283b-6: cing mi rnyed pa'i phyir stong pa nyid las kyang
T03D3819:283b-7: gzugs gzhan ma yin zhes bya'o //
T03D3819:283b-8: de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
T03D3819:283b-11: rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o zhes pa ni
T03D3819:283b-12: gzugs la ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du phung po
T03D3819:283b-13: lhag ma rnams kyang de dang 'dra bar blta'o //
T03D3819:283b-14: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid de zhes bya ba la /
T03D3819:283b-15: sh'a ri'i bu zhes pa ni ma yengs par legs par nyon cig ces bod pa'i tshig go /
T03D3819:283b-16: de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni
T03D3819:283b-17: phung po lnga la ji ltar bshad pa ltar gzhan
T03D3819:283b-19: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du 'jig rten
T03D3819:283b-20: las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid
T03D3819:283b-21: du shes par gyis shig pa'o //
T03D3819:283b-22: mtshan nyid med pa zhes pa ni nam mkha' la
T03D3819:283b-23: mtshan nyid med pa ltar nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3819:283b-24: kyang med rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyang med
T03D3819:283b-25: pa'o // mi skye mi 'gag pa zhes pa ni
T03D3819:283b-26: da ltar skyes pa ni sngon med pa las phyis
T03D3819:283b-28: 'gag pa ni sngon yod pa las phyis med par gyur pa'o //
T03D3819:283b-29: stong pa nyid ni dmigs su med pas sngon nas ma skyes pa'o //
T03D3819:283b-30: ma skyes pas na phyis mi 'gag pa'o //
T03D3819:283b-32: dri ma dang bral ba med pa zhes bya ba la /
T03D3819:283b-33: dri ma zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa rnams kyis gzung 'dzin du spyod pa'o //
T03D3819:283b-34: stong pa nyid ni rnam par shes pa las 'das pas dri ma med pa'o //
T03D3819:283b-35: dri ma dang bral ba med pa ni dri ma med pas bral ba yang med pa'o //
T03D3819:283b-36: bri ba med pa gang ba med pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T03D3819:283b-37: bri ba zhes bya ba ni sems can no //
T03D3819:283b-38: gang ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas so //
T03D3819:283b-39: med pa zhes pa ni sems can dang sangs rgyas
T03D3819:283b-40: bcal du yang mi rnyed pas bri ba dang gang
T03D3819:283b-41: ba med pa'o // de ltar na stong pa nyid ni gzugs ma yin zhes bya ba la /
T03D3819:283b-42: gzugs ni gzhig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:283b-43: stong pa nyid la mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid ni gzugs ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-0: de bzhin du tshor ba ni myong ba'i @284a * //
T03D3819:284a-4: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284a-5: rnam par shes pa rnams ma yin /
T03D3819:284a-6: rnam par shes pa ni so sor bye brag 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284a-7: stong pa nyid ni dmigs su med pas rnam par shes pa rnams ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-8: rnams ma yin zhes pa ni phung po lnga rnams
T03D3819:284a-9: ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi
T03D3819:284a-10: / stong pa nyid ni phung po lnga rnams ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-12: de la mig ni mthong ba'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284a-13: stong pa nyid la mtshan nyid med pas stong pa nyid mig ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-15: de bzhin du rna ba ni thos pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3819:284a-17: sna ni snom pa'i mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284a-19: lce ni ro myang ba'i mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284a-21: lus ni reg pa'i mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284a-23: yid ni bye brag gcod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi ;
T03D3819:284a-24: stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid med pas yid ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-25: de ltar dbang po drug po ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284a-26: stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid med pas dbang po drug rnams ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-28: gzugs ni kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284a-29: stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid med pas gzugs ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-31: de bzhin du sgra ni snyan mi snyan gyi mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284a-33: dri ni snom pa'i mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284a-35: ro ni bro ba'i mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284a-37: reg bya ni reg pa 'jam rtsub kyi mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284a-39: chos ni bye brag gi rnam pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284a-40: stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid med pas chos ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-41: de ltar na yul rnams ni dmigs par byed pa'i rkyen gyi mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284a-42: stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid med pas yul rnams ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-43: mig gi khams ma yin pa nas /
T03D3819:284a-45: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-46: de la khams bco brgyad ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284a-47: stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid med pas khams bco brgyad ma yin no //
T03D3819:284a-48: ma rig pa ma yin pa nas rga shi ma yin /
T03D3819:284a-49: ma rig pa zad pa nas rga shi zad pa'i bar du ma yin no //
T03D3819:284b-0: ma rig pa nas rga shi'i @284b bar du rten
T03D3819:284b-1: 'brel bcu gnyis ni 'khor ba 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3819:284b-2: yin gyi / stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid ma
T03D3819:284b-3: yin pas ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar du
T03D3819:284b-4: yin gyi / ma yin no // ma rig pa zad pa nas /
T03D3819:284b-5: rga shi zad pa'i bar du rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284b-6: stong pa nyid ni mtshan nyid med pas ma rig
T03D3819:284b-7: pa zad pa nas rga shi zad pa'i bar du
T03D3819:284b-8: ma yin no // sdug bsngal ba dang /
T03D3819:284b-10: 'gog pa dang lam yang ma yin no //
T03D3819:284b-11: sdug bsngal ni nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284b-12: kun 'byung ba ni nye bar len pa'i mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284b-13: 'gog pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid /
T03D3819:284b-14: lam ni shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284b-15: stong pa nyid la mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir stong pa nyid bden pa bzhi ma yin no //
T03D3819:284b-17: ye shes ni chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
T03D3819:284b-18: stong pa nyid la mtshan nyid med pas ye shes ma yin no //
T03D3819:284b-20: ma thob pa yang ma yin no //
T03D3819:284b-21: thob pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T03D3819:284b-22: ma thob pa ni sems can gyis bla na med pa ma thob pa'o //
T03D3819:284b-23: ma yin no zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi
T03D3819:284b-24: mtshan nyid la bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang
T03D3819:284b-25: med / sems can yang med pas thob pa yang ma yin /
T03D3819:284b-26: ma thob pa yang ma yin no //
T03D3819:284b-27: rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de /
T03D3819:284b-28: stong pa nyid ni de lta bu yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3819:284b-29: 'di yan chad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
T03D3819:284b-30: da ni shes rab kyi spyod yul gyi don gyis bshad de /
T03D3819:284b-31: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thob
T03D3819:284b-32: pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3819:284b-33: pa la gnas shing spyod de zhes pa la /
T03D3819:284b-34: ma chud pa la chud do snyam pa 'byung ba'i
T03D3819:284b-35: phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod
T03D3819:284b-36: yul 'di tsam zhig dang ldan na stong pa nyid
T03D3819:284b-37: du spyod pa'i mtshan mar bshad pa de ltar zhes
T03D3819:284b-38: pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid du gyur
T03D3819:284b-39: pa'i phyir ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob
T03D3819:284b-40: pa med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3819:284b-41: pa la spyod ces pa ni thog pa chen po
T03D3819:284b-42: la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis phung
T03D3819:284b-43: po lnga nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du ci
T03D3819:284b-44: yang thob pa med par shes shing chos gang yang
T03D3819:284b-45: rdul tsam rjes su mi mthong bar shes rab kyi
T03D3819:284b-46: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o //
T03D3819:284b-47: chos thams cad stong pa ste /
T03D3819:285a-1: bzhin yin yang de ltar mi shes pa'i ma rig
T03D3819:285a-2: pa'i 'khrul pa'i sems kyis mun par gyur pas srid
T03D3819:285a-4: 'khrul pa'i sems de nyid ci yin zhes shes rab rnam gsum gyis brtags na /
T03D3819:285a-5: sems ni dmigs su med pas nyon mongs pa yang mi mthong /
T03D3819:285a-6: rnam par byang bar yang mi mthong /
T03D3819:285a-7: phung po lnga nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ngo //
T03D3819:285a-11: mi 'gag pa la sogs pa yang mi mthong /
T03D3819:285a-12: shes rab nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
T03D3819:285a-13: ci yang mthong ba med pa de ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid mthong ba'o //
T03D3819:285a-14: de ltar sems kyi ngo bo nyid mthong ba de ni byang chub mthong ngo //
T03D3819:285a-15: gang byang chub mthong ba de ni chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba'o //
T03D3819:285a-16: chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba des ni bdag
T03D3819:285a-17: nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
T03D3819:285a-19: skabs 'dir ni the tshom pas smras pa /
T03D3819:285a-20: de ltar ci yang med pa sha stag tu bshad pas mu stegs can chad par lta ba dang /
T03D3819:285a-21: nyan thos zhi ba'i 'gog pa'i nang du ltung bar mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
T03D3819:285a-23: de ltar mi 'gyur te mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
T03D3819:285a-24: sems can gyi don byed cing bla na med pa'i
T03D3819:285a-25: byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /
T03D3819:285a-26: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa mi
T03D3819:285a-27: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod par byed pas de ltar
T03D3819:285a-29: 'di yan chad ni shes rab kyi spyod yul lo //
T03D3819:285a-30: da ni shes rab kyi yon tan gyis bshad de /
T03D3819:285a-31: sems la skrag pa med pas sgrib pa med de ;
T03D3819:285a-32: phyin ci log las shin du 'das nas mya ngan
T03D3819:285a-33: las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to zhes bya ba la
T03D3819:285a-34: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid don la thos pa dang /
T03D3819:285a-36: bsgom pa'i bar du mi skrag pas /
T03D3819:285a-40: bag chags thams cad zlog par byed pas na /
T03D3819:285a-41: sems kyi sgrib pa med ces bya'o //
T03D3819:285a-42: byis pa lta bu'i spyod pa mu stegs can dang /
T03D3819:285a-44: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las shin tu 'das nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T03D3819:285a-45: shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad zad de /
T03D3819:285a-46: mya ngan las 'das pa chen por phyin to//
T03D3819:285b-0: @285b 'di yan chad ni shes rab kyi yon tan no //
T03D3819:285b-1: da ni shes rab kyi 'bras bu'i don gyis bshad de /
T03D3819:285b-2: dus gsum du rnam par gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams
T03D3819:285b-3: cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3819:285b-4: la gnas nas / bla na med pa yang dag
T03D3819:285b-5: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas
T03D3819:285b-7: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas dus gsum du
T03D3819:285b-8: gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi
T03D3819:285b-9: pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin /
T03D3819:285b-12: gzhan la ston cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:285b-13: phyin pa la spyod pas bla na med pa'i byang
T03D3819:285b-14: chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
T03D3819:285b-15: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /
T03D3819:285b-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bskyed shes
T03D3819:285b-17: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bas
T03D3819:285b-18: na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
T03D3819:285b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa'o //
T03D3819:285b-20: 'di yan chad ni shes rab kyi 'bras bu'o //
T03D3819:285b-21: da ni shes rab kyi gzungs kyi don gyis bshad de /
T03D3819:285b-22: de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:285b-23: phyin pa'i sngags ni bden te ma nor ba'o zhes
T03D3819:285b-24: pa la / de lta bas na zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3819:285b-25: gong du gsungs pa yin pas na de lta bas na zhes bya'o //
T03D3819:285b-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags bden
T03D3819:285b-27: te ma nor ba zhes bya ba ni shes rab
T03D3819:285b-28: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don rig par spyod
T03D3819:285b-29: pa ni sngags zhes bya ste /
T03D3819:285b-30: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyang bla na med
T03D3819:285b-31: pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa chen por 'gyur zhing
T03D3819:285b-32: / bdag dang gzhan yang bla na med pa'i byang
T03D3819:285b-33: chub tu 'tshang rgya bas na bden te ma nor
T03D3819:285b-34: / ba zhes bya'o // rig pa chen po'i sngags
T03D3819:285b-35: zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:285b-36: phyin pa'i don rig pa'i sngags ni 'dod chags zhe
T03D3819:285b-38: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad brjod pa med pa'i
T03D3819:285b-39: rang bzhin med par ston pas na shes rab kyi
T03D3819:285b-40: pha rol tu phyin pa ni rig pa chen po'i
T03D3819:285b-41: sngags so // bla na med pa'i sngags zhes pa ni /
T03D3819:285b-42: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bla
T03D3819:285b-43: na med pa'i byang chub tu 'grub par byed pas
T03D3819:285b-44: na / bla na med pa'i sngags so //
T03D3819:285b-45: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags zhes pa ni /
T03D3819:285b-46: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa dang /
T03D3819:285b-48: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang mi mnyam zhing /
T03D3819:286a-1: thams cad kyi ye shes dang mnyam par byed pas na mi mnyam dang mnyam pa'i sngags so //
T03D3819:286a-2: sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i
T03D3819:286a-3: sngags su shes par bya ste zhes bya ba ni
T03D3819:286a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang /
T03D3819:286a-5: klog / kha ton byed pa dang /
T03D3819:286a-6: tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
T03D3819:286a-7: gzhan la 'chad pa ni mig nad la sogs pa nad thams cad med par 'gyur zhing /
T03D3819:286a-9: lha klu la sogs pas skyob par byed /
T03D3819:286a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pas
T03D3819:286a-11: ngan 'gro dang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad zlog
T03D3819:286a-12: par byed pas na sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu
T03D3819:286a-13: zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so //
T03D3819:286a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa /
T03D3819:286a-20: bo dhi sv'a h'a zhes pa la /
T03D3819:286a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags 'di
T03D3819:286a-22: ni zab mo'i mchog thams cad kyi don bsdus pa
T03D3819:286a-23: rang bzhin gyis grub par byed pas byin gyis brlabs
T03D3819:286a-25: sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T03D3819:286a-26: pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3819:286a-27: pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o zhes pa ni
T03D3819:286a-28: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab
T03D3819:286a-29: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pa las sangs
T03D3819:286a-30: rgyas pas na theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i
T03D3819:286a-31: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi
T03D3819:286a-32: pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
T03D3819:286a-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te zhes pa ni /
T03D3819:286a-34: bcom ldan 'das zab mo'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i mthus sh'a ri'i bus dris te /
T03D3819:286a-35: spyan ras gzigs kyis bshad nas de'i don rdzogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs so //
T03D3819:286a-36: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
T03D3819:286a-37: gzigs kyi dbang po la legs so zhes bya ba
T03D3819:286a-38: byin nas / legs so legs so zhes pa ni
T03D3819:286a-39: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i
T03D3819:286a-40: byin nas / don smras pa / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang mthun te /
T03D3819:286a-41: ma nor ba'i phyir legs so zhes bstod pa'o //
T03D3819:286a-42: rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no //
T03D3819:286a-43: rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te /
T03D3819:286a-44: ji ltar khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:286a-45: phyin pa zab mo bstan pa bzhin du spyad par
T03D3819:286a-46: bya ste zhes pa ni spyan ras gzigs kyis ji
T03D3819:286b-0: @286b skad smras pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
T03D3819:286b-1: gsungs pa dang mthun pas na de bzhin no //
T03D3819:286b-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de bzhin du /
T03D3819:286b-3: theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang spyad par bya'o //
T03D3819:286b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa yang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes pa ni /
T03D3819:286b-5: spyan ras gzigs kyis bshad pa la de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su yi rang bar mdzad na /
T03D3819:286b-6: gzhan gyis the tshom mi za ba lta ci smos zhes pa'o //
T03D3819:286b-7: bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal
T03D3819:286b-8: nas zhes pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:286b-9: phyin pa smras pa des 'khor thams cad kyang shes
T03D3819:286b-10: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don rtogs par
T03D3819:286b-11: gyur nas / theg pa chen po la sgrib pa
T03D3819:286b-12: med pa'i phyir dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal
T03D3819:286b-13: gyur nas / pa'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T03D3819:286b-14: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /
T03D3819:286b-18: dri zar bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o //
T03D3819:286b-19: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3819:286b-20: phyin pa'i snying po'i 'grel pa slob dpon dzny'a na
